string: 基地 + 城镇 + 住所

original: Heals the target <mag> points. Works on most actors.
string: 治疗目标 <mag> 点生命。对于大多数人物可用。

original: Calms all Followers and Teammates for <dur> seconds.
string: 安抚所有随从和队友 <dur> 秒。
随从重新给他们的武器充能。

original: Set up a Follower's worn items by pointing at them.
string: 通过指向随从的磨损物品来设置它们。

original: Set up a Follower's worn items by pointing at them.
string: 通过指向随从的磨损物品来设置它们。

original: Followers have Stealth Effects greatly increased.
string: 随从的潜行效果大大提高。

original: Creates a hovering light that lasts for <dur> seconds.
string: 制造一个悬浮的光源，持续<dur>秒。

original: Creates a hovering light that lasts for <dur> seconds.
string: 制造一个悬浮的光源，持续<dur>秒。

original: Creates a hovering light that lasts for <dur> seconds.
string: 制造一个悬浮的光源，持续<dur>秒。
随从向玩家所在地点撤退。

original: Make Followers attack the player's target.
string: 让随从攻击玩家的目标。
让随从攻击玩家的目标。

original: Take on the form of the wolf.

string: 嘲讽视觉防止飞行效果

original: Naked helmet that can be crafted to help hide outfit helmet if you have issues.
string: 如果有问题，可以设计裸露头盔以帮助隐藏装备头盔。

original: Candlelight Once cast, a wizard's light will follow you, illuminating the nearby area. You can set the light style in the MCM.
string: 烛光 一旦施法，一个术士烛光就会跟随你，照亮附近的区域。你可以在MCM中设置烛光样式。

original: Gold solves most problems, doesn't it?
How can I argue with that?
I don't have to take that from you!
If you change your mind, you know where to find me.
string: 如果你改变主意了，你知道在哪里可以找到我。

original: You expect me to believe that?
I stand beside you. As always.
Come on, he's not so tough.
Come on, she's not so tough.
Twelve septims on the big one!
string: 十二枚金币赌大只的赢！

original: You just going to stand there and take it? Fight back.
string: 你就准备傻站那里挨揍？打回去。

original: Who taught you to fight? Keep those hands up!
string: 谁教你打架的？把两手举高！

original: You want a real fight, eh?
Come on. Let's see what you're made of.
string: 来吧，看看你有什么本事。

original: What would you ask of me?

string: 好吧……既然你这么说的话。
不得不承认，我印象深刻。

original: Good job. I can see you know what you're doing.
string: 做得好。我看得出来，你很在行。

original: Is there something else you need?
That sounds like a good choice to me.
string: 我觉得这是个不错的选择。

original: How can I argue with that?
How can I argue with that?

string: [现在按你自己的意志自由活动，you are free]
[现在按你自己的意志自由活动，you are free]

original: I'm glad you're here with me.
string: 我很高兴你跟我在一起。

original: Has the store made any money?
Would you mind cooking something for me?
string: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

original: I'd like to see your additional follower inventory.
string: 我想看看你的额外库存。
随从装备包裹高优先级
随从装备包裹极高优先级

original:
<Global=nwsGoldLooted> Gold... Nice Haul!

Would you like to share this loot with your followers?
string:
<Global=nwsGoldLooted> 金币... 干得好！

你想和你的随从分享这些战利品吗？

original:
Would you like to Store the Adventuring Gear for <Alias=followerSpeaker>?

(Stored Gear is updated automatically and will be re-applied if the follower is recruited later)
string:
你想把冒险装备放在<Alias=followerSpeaker>身上？

(储存的装备会自动更新，如果后续招募跟随者，则会重新使用)

original:
Remove Crafting/Interactions for <Alias=followerSpeaker>?

(Doesn't prevent you from making your own changes)
string:
为 <Alias=followerSpeaker> 移除制作/交互？

(并不妨碍你做出自己的改变)

original:
Remove Adventuring Gear for <Alias=followerSpeaker>?

(Doesn't prevent you from making your own changes)
string:
为 <Alias=followerSpeaker> 移除冒险装备？

(并不妨碍你做出自己的改变)

original:
Remove Behaviorial Settings for <Alias=followerSpeaker>?

(Doesn't prevent you from making your own changes)
string:
为 <Alias=followerSpeaker> 移除行为设置？

(并不妨碍你做出自己的改变)

original: <Alias=followerSpeaker> is waiting. Summon them to you?
string: <Alias=followerSpeaker> 正在等待中。需要把他们召唤过来吗？

original:
Please choose the type of Follower to remove:

Standard - Vanilla voiced, 3DNPC or otherwise normal follower.
Expendable - Recruited npc via NFF's hiring dialogue. (Not Vanilla hirelings).
Imported - Follower that was imported into NFF. (Serana, Sofia, etc.)
string:
请选择要删除的随从类型：

标准 - 原版语音，3DNPC或其他普通的随从。
消耗性 - 通过NFF的招聘对话招募npc。 （非原版雇佣者）。
已导入 - 已导入NFF的随从。 （瑟拉娜，索菲亚等）

original:
Temporary storage for <Alias=followerSpeaker> will be disabled and any items will be moved to the clothing satchel which can be used as additional storage.

(This message will only show once)
string:
<Alias=followerSpeaker>的临时存储空间将被禁用，任何物品都将被移到服装背包中，可以作为附加存储。

（此消息仅显示一次）

original:
<Alias=followerSpeaker> is no longer flagged as a Player Teammate and may have been dismissed.

Do you want to automatically Export them from NFF when this happens?
string:
<Alias=followerSpeaker> 不再被标记为玩家队友，可能已经被开除。

当这种情况发生时，你想从NFF自动导出它们吗？

original:
<Alias=checkActor> is currently a Player Teammate.

Do you want to automatically Import them into NFF when this happens?

(This will only be asked once per unique NPC)
string:
<Alias=checkActor> 目前是一名玩家队友。

当发生这种情况时，你想把它们自动导入NFF吗？

(每个独特的NPC只会被问到一次。)

original:
<Alias=followerSpeaker>'s Adventuring Gear is empty. Do you wish to stop managing gear for this follower?

(Choosing "No" will set Gear to be Naked, giving you the default equipping style without the outfit in the way)
string:
<Alias=followerSpeaker>的冒险装备是空的。你想停止管理这个随从的装备吗？

(选择 "不" 会将装备设置为“裸装”，使您拥有默认的装备样式，而不会妨碍装备的使用)

original:
Apply Recommended Tweak Settings for <Alias=followerSpeaker>?

(Doesn't prevent you from making your own changes)
string:
为 <Alias=followerSpeaker> 应用推荐设置？

(并不妨碍你做出自己的改变)

original:
By default, the Follower Framework checks the current follower count periodically (in real time). This allows maximum compatibility with both vanilla systems and follower mods, which might set the follower count to 1 upon recruiting any follower.

If turned off, you can still have the Framework check and adjust the follower count by telling a potential follower that you have room in your party via a dialogue option.
string:
默认情况下，随从框架定期（实时）检查当前的随从数量。这保证了原版系统和随从mods的最大兼容性，这可能意味着在招募任何随从时会将随从数量设置为1。

如果关闭，系统仍然可以通过对话选项告诉潜在的随从您的队伍中有空位来检查和调整随从的数量。
